page.title: 15MY VILLAGE: RAWNSLEY
page.content: {Rawnsley}is a very untidy place but it is a very pleasant place to live because there is little traffic, it is quiet and it is close to{Cannock Chase}. The trouble is there are a few vandals who damage places like our park. They spray paint all over the slide, they kick fences down, and they trample trees down. I think they should appreciate things in life. The council has decided to get extra help to repair damaged and dilapidated buildings and to clean and tidy community areas. Most of the housing is council owned but a few have been bought from the council. A new village has been built with better houses that are more carefully looked after. It has two football pitches and a park.
